item.title: A step-by-step technical guide for open source contribution
item.description: Intro This is a very simple guide for first-timers to making open source contributions. I guess that you already have a GitHub account and know basic git commands. Steps for Contributing Fork First, we need to choose a project we want to contribute. Then we will fork the project to our github account. Clone Now, we need to clone the project to our machine from our fork. $ git clone <url> Syncing the fork We should keep our fork up-to-date with the main(aka upstream) repository.
